description: Base class for MXLIMS Jobs - an experiment or calculation producing Datasets
title: Job

sample_id.description: String UUID of the PreparedSample that applies to this Job
sample_id.title: Sample Id

logistical_sample_id.description: String UUID of LogisticalSample relevant to this Job.
logistical_sample_id.title: Logistical Sample Id

started_from_id.description: String UUID of the Job from which this Job was started.
started_from_id.title: Started From Id

start_time.description: Actual starting time for job or calculation,
start_time.title: Start Time

end_time.description: Actual finishing time for job or calculation,
end_time.title: End Time

input_data_ids.description: String UUID of input Datasets for this Job.
input_data_ids.title: Input Data Ids

reference_data_ids.description: String UUID of reference Datasets for this Job.
reference_data_ids.title: Reference Data Ids

template_data_ids.description: String UUID of template Datasets for this Job.
template_data_ids.title: Template Data Ids

subjobs.description: List of Jobs started from this job. NB the started_from_id of the jobs must point to this Job.This field allows attached jobs to be contained directly in the JSON fileand allows for constraining job types in subtypes
subjobs.title: Subjobs

results.description: List of Datasets created from this job. NB the source_id of the datasets must point to this Job.This field allows result Datasets to be contained directly in the JSON fileand allows for constraining Dataset types in subtypes
results.title: Results

template_data.description: List of Template Datasets used for this job. NB the id of the datasets must match the IDs in template_data_ids.This field allows template Datasets to be contained directly in the JSON fileand allows for constraining Dataset types in subtypes.NB Note that two different specifications of a dataset cannot have the same ID
template_data.title: Template Data
